import useSWR, { mutate } from "swr"; import formatRelative from "date-fns/formatRelative"; import differenceInMinutes from "date-fns/differenceInMinutes"; import Link from "next/link"; import Layout from "../pages/Components/Layout"; import gql from "graphql-tag"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { hasuraUserClient } from "../lib/hasura-user-client"; import { useAuthState, useAuthDispatch } from "../context/auth"; const id = 22; const GetCandidats = gql` query MyQuery($id: Int!) { Todo(where: { User: { id: { _eq: $id } } }) { Completed Date Description Name } } `; export const getStaticProps = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const initialData = await hasura.request(GetCandidats, { id }); return { props: { initialData, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; export default function MembersPage({ initialData }) { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const router = useRouter(); const { isAuthenticated, user } = useAuthState(); console.log(user.id); const { data } = useSWR(GetCandidats, (query) => hasura.request(query), { initialData, revalidateOnMount: true, }); return (
